title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.1 Ensure deployment configuration files are separated from source code
control_description: Deployment configurations are often stored in a version control system. Separate deployment configuration files from source code repositories.

title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.2 Ensure changes in deployment configuration are tracked
control_description: Audit and track changes made in deployment configuration.

title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.3 Ensure scanners are in place to identify and prevent sensitive data in deployment configuration
control_description: Detect and prevent sensitive data—such as confidential ID numbers, passwords, etc, in deployment configurations.

title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.4 Ensure access to deployment configurations are limited to specific members
control_description: Restrict access to the deployment configuration to trusted and qualified users only.

title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.5 Ensure scanners are in place to secure Infrastructure as Code (IaC) instructions
control_description: Detect and prevent misconfigurations or insecure instructions in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) files, such as Terraform files.

title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.6 Ensure deployment configuration manifests are verified

title: 5.1 Verification
control_title: 5.1.7 Ensure deployment configuration manifests are pinned to a specific, verified version
control_description: Deployment configuration is often stored in a version control system and is pulled from there. Pin the configuration used to a specific, verified version or commit Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA). Avoid referring configuration without its version tag specified.

title: 5.2 Deployment Environment
control_description: Automate deployments of production environment and application.

title: 5.2 Deployment Environment
control_title: 5.2.2 Ensure the deployment environment is reproducible
control_description: Verify that the deployment environment—the orchestrator and the production environment where the application is deployed—is reproducible. This means that the environment stays the same in each deployment if the configuration has not changed.

title: 5.2 Deployment Environment
control_title: 5.2.3 Ensure access to production environment is limited
control_description: Restrict access to the production environment to a few trusted and qualified users only.

title: 5.2 Deployment Environment
control_title: 5.2.4 Ensure default passwords are not used
control_description: Do not use default passwords of deployment tools and components.
